reasons: prediction_1 and prediction_2 are identical and more coherent than prediction_0
output:
Attention please. Two minutes to bomb time. Prepare to take shelter.
If you have no goggles, turn away. Remember the heat flash and concussion that will hold are dangerous.
Those shells can't get rid of them. They put out some sort of electromagnetic covering, but we're taking risks.
Attention all battalions. Prepare for volley fire. Repeat.
To all corners of the world.
